body.name: THE SKINNY CONFIDENTIAL HOT SHAVE CREAM, Women’s Facial Shaving Cream for Dermaplanning & Shaving to Remove Hair & Peach Fuzz, Travel Size

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The Skinny Confidential Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 4 mins
features: FACIAL SHAVING CREAM FOR WOMEN: The HOT SHAVE CREAM is the first ever women’s facial shaving cream created specifically for woman’s face. Reformulated to include an even richer blend of ingredients that will leave your face smooth and glowy.
A CLOSER SHAVE: It will help achieve a closer shave, leaving your skin looking soft, supple, & deliciously dewy long after rinsing.
EXTRA SMOOTH GLIDE: Your HOT SHAVE Razor will easily glide over your skin removing peach fuzz for a flawless shave without the nicks, cuts, and irritation.
HYDRATING INGREDIENTS: Made of nourishing and moisturizing ingredients like shea butter, Vitamin E, aloe, and olive oil.

COMPLETE YOUR ROUTINE: Apply a thin layer of the HOT SHAVE Cream onto wet skin before shaving with your HOT SHAVE Razor. Ensure skin is pulled taut and your HOT SHAVE Razor is angled at 45-degrees, then start shaving downward in short, gentle strokes (be mindful not to drag it against your skin).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice addition to dermaplaning
reviews.reviewText: I have only dermaplaned with my face totally dry. Though I kind of felt like I was a guy shaving my face, this is a game changer. It leaves you so smooth, with no irritation. The shaver does get kind clogged up, so be sure to rinse well as you are using it. This is not a shave foam - it's a thicker cream. A little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Shave cream from Skinny Confidential
reviews.reviewText: I have found dermaplanning to work out better for me at removing facial hair and peach fuzz versus with a razor. I feel my skin looks and feels smoother with less irritation that shaving can cause. That being said I have wanted to try skinny confidential's hot shave cream since I own their hot shave dermaplanning razor and was glad to see this product become available. Before receiving the cream I was just dermaplanning on dry skin or the morning after using face oils. Both of which worked out fine. The cream itself comes in a pretty pink squeeze tube. The cream is a slightly thicker consistency with a slight smell. I left my face wet after showering and just used a dime sized amount of the cream and smoothed over my face. It did give me a nice close smooth shave and removed all my hair/peach fuzz along. I did have to clean the razor off after every swipe as the cream builds up on the razor. I was able to wash it off of the razor once done. I washed the remaining cream off of my face and then moisturized as normal. My face is not only hair free but the surface of my skin looks quite smooth as well. I have sensitive skin and have no problems with any irritation from this as well. Overall a good shave cream from skinny confidential

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE SKINNY CONFIDENTIAL HOT SHAVE CREAM
reviews.reviewText: I normally dermaplane dry and it irritates my face. I, for some weird reason, never thought to use shaving cream. I guess it would have made me feel like I was a dude shaving my face! Anywho, I saw this and ordered it to accompany my SKINNY CONFIDENTIAL HOT SHAVE Razor.It’s essentially shaving cream targeted for females, I guess, to use while dermaplaning. It’s pricey and while I don’t know how it would be using regular shaving cream, this definitely gives me a closer shave. My face wasn’t irritated either, which is great now that it’s gotten colder and my face is sensitive now. The area I dermaplaned and used this, feels smoother and looks better.I really do like what this does for my face and while it is pricey, I only use this for my face. So, I don’t really mind the price for the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I wish the bottle were bigger!
reviews.reviewText: I’m not exactly sure why this is labeled “hot shave” after reading the instructions. I found it just to be a thicker style shave cream. It was used on the armpits since they’re sensitive. It did seem like my razor glided much more easily than normal. I may have even gotten a closer shave as a result as well. Too bad it’s such a small bottle though! I would love to use it on my legs but this would be rather cost prohibitive given the small tube and relatively large surface area of the legs.Overall seems to give a really nice close and smooth shave compared to other shaving aids. Since it is marketed for women specifically, it would have been nice to see a larger bottle so it could also be used on the legs. But hey, maybe more women are shaving their faces than I realize who would be happy to have a smaller bottle for that purpose alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my face smoother longer
reviews.reviewText: I have been dermaplaning my face for a few years. I've done it on clean skin and have also used lotion. This shave cream went on easily and allowed me to do my whole face quickly and with no pain. I have also noticed that my face has remained smoother longer. I am very pleased with this product and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t dry my skin out or break it out
reviews.reviewText: This cream is kind of like a thick lotion it was easy to use easy to apply easy to remove, I was able to shave off the peach fuzz and some thicker hairs on my face the scent of the cream isn’t bad at all I normally derma plane my face with just water so this was a nice change instead of just using water and the shaver I got off the hairs on my face and it left it smoother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for dermaplaning
reviews.reviewText: This shave cream is wonderful, perfect for dermaplaning. I usually just use moisturizing face wash but this works so much better. I was able to get a close, exfoliating shave… totally removing my peach fuzz and dead skin. The tube is a great size and I feel like this will last me a while, it doesn’t take much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Facial shave cream for Women
reviews.reviewText: It’s a sad fact that as we get older hair shows up in places it never really did before. I’ve been using body wash to shave my face so I decided to try this shave cream. It has a nice thick whipped consistency and is unscented. It applies nicely and is easy to use. The reason for the 4 stars is the price point. While it did leave my face feeling nicer than my body wash I can’t see myself repurchasing this at its current price. I will say this is a unique product and I do believe there is a market for it.
